body.name: Air Fryer Toaster Oven 16-Quart, TINTALK 10-in-1 Airfryer Oven Combo - 1700W Large Air fryer Convection Oven, Countertop Combo with 9 Accessories Rotisserie | Dehydrator
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Pro-Grade Stainless Steel Interior】TINTALK air fryer interior is made with 304 food-grade stainless steel instead of tin-plating, ensure eating safety and no odor smell. BPA-free, easy-cleaning as well as anti-corrosion. The durable construction stands up to whatever life brings. 16qt family size oven is easy to prepare a big meal for up to 8 people. 3 separate tiers design makes fry up main course and side dish all at once possible.

【One Touch Start&All-in-One Multitasker】Equipped with sensitive touchscreen and intuitive icons, this digital air fryer oven is easy to use even with wet fingertips. 10 smart presets for quick start without guesswork, make cooking easy and beginner-friendly. Rotary knobs can be adjusted to your desired temperature(120-480°F) & time(0-120mins) quickly and precisely instead of tiring press "+" or "-". Tintalk power air fryer oven combo makes your life simple.

【Integration of Taste and Health】Coupled with NTC temp probe and PID chip algorithm, our smart air fryer convection oven owns top-performing smart temperature control system, which ensures a precise and stable temperature through cooking process by 100 times per second temp. checking to deliver crispy and juicy result. Up to 85% less fat than traditional frying oven, this oilless air fryer oven is your heathier choice to enjoy food guilt-free. Best gift for health-conscious family or friends.

【Cooking 30% Faster&Independent Switch Heating】Up&Down heating elements combining with 360° hot air circulation make the temperature up to 480°F, which can cook flavorful family-friendly meals by cutting off 30% cooking time and make the ingredients evenly with juicy crunch. Best for busy households on the go! In addition, Up&Down heating elements can be independent switch. 3 customized heating modes, this air fryer countertop oven bring you various taste experiences.

【What You Get-2 Year Warranty】This stainless convection oven rotisserie is multifaceted with 9 accessories: drip tray, grill tray, rossisserie forks, mesh basket, wire rack, removal tool, rolling cage, a tong and a glove. Included 50+ recipes let you will never run out of ideas of what to cook. We promise to provide all Tintalk countertop oven dehydrator 2 year warranty and lifetime technical support. No matter what issue you have, we’re here to help and provide 100% amazing customer support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stainless Steel Interior 304 food-grade stainless steel interior ensure no odor when cooking. Rust-resistant function enhance durability and prolong the service life. PFOA-free&BPA-free 100% safe premium material ensure your healthy life. 3 Customized Angles Double glasses door have 3 customized angles(30°-60°-90°). It effectively prevent the hot air rushing out immediately after the door is opened to scald your hands. Say Goodbay To Calories Our air fryers use less Oil than Traditional Oil Frying, less fat, and healthy cooking

Cooking 30% Faster In a time crunch? Powerful 1700W heating system and 360° rapid air circulation technology cooks food 30% faster. Perfectly prepares a family-sized meal as little as 20min with this compact air fryer rotisserie. Independent Switch Heating Up&Down heating elements can be independent switch. After cooking, if you want the bottom of the food to be crispier, no need to trun it over, just switch on the "Down" heating tube. Ultra Quiet Operation When in operation, the quiet air fryer toaster oven produces less than 48dB of noise without loud or annoying noise. No interfering with baby sleeping or watching TV on living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Want to give it 10 stars
reviews.reviewText: I unboxed it and everything that was supposed to be included was included. I had a bad experience with one that I returned.I began by making toast. It is not easy to ruin toast. Well, it came out almost perfectly [The bread was refrigerated - my error]. I will adjust the wire rack next time to a higher level and reduce the time from 6 minutes to 5 minutes. So far 5 stars out of 5.Next, I grilled a frozen, pre-cooked sausage patty. I pre-heated the oven, but reduced the time to 6 minutes. I put the patty on the grill tray and put it on the lowest level, using the "steak" setting for 4 minutes. It came out perfectly. Again, 5 stars out of 5.NOTE: I did add a sheet of aluminum foil [shiny side down] on the drip tray to keep it as clean as possible. No effect on time, temperature or result. There was no information about using aluminum foil in the instructions, so I felt that it would be OK.Then I used the "air fry" setting. I put 8 frozen chicken nuggets in the wire basket, set the oven for "wings" [the nuggets are small like wings], set the pre-heat to 5 minutes and set the time to 10 minutes. Pre-heat went off and I put the wire basket on the second level from the bottom and anxiously waited for the 10 minute timer to finish. Not to my amazement, they also came out perfectly. I added some hot sauce for flavor. Once again, 5 stars out of 5.NOTE: These were not home made. Over the weekend when I have more time, I will make chicken nuggets from scratch.Pros: Easy to use. Easy to clean. The only 2 knobs [Temperature and Time] are well lit from the back, easy to see and easy to turn. The food comes out perfectly cooked. It is very easy to adjust the Temperature and/or Time. The instructions are clear with black and white drawings.Con: As hard as I tried, I was not able to teach the oven to walk my dog or fill out my tax returns and I am not able to give it 10 stars.This is a BIG WINNER. Buy one. You will not be sorry.Well here is the weekend. I made an egg and heavy cream wash and rolled some chicken in Panko crumbs with some spices. Turned the air fryer on, used the settings for chicken. Perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: While I’ve only had this air fryer for a short time, I’m extremely pleased with this purchase! I’ve been looking at air fryers for months and finally decided on TinTalk. It’s very well made, all stainless steel which was very important to me as I didn’t want any plastic, it’s super easy to use (although they misspelled “reheat” and put “rehet”), it’s easy to clean, and came with a number of great accessories. So far I’ve cooked frozen french fries and they came out superb! I cooked chicken breast last night and it came out ok but only because I need to get use to the correct temperature and time which I’ll work out after using it awhile. I’m not one to post reviews but I’m so pleased with this air fryer I felt compelled to share my opinion. I Love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't Rely the Recipe Book
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace my broken toaster oven and I've been waiting a few weeks to write the review, specifically, before I tried out a few of the recipes in the book that comes with the air fryer. Because of that, I had thought that there was something wrong with the appliance because nothing was coming out right. So far, I have attempted to make the Apple Crisps, Mozarella Sticks, Banana Bread, Sweet Potato Fries and the German Pancakes.All of them came out WRONG.The German Pancakes were underbaked (liquid in the middle). The Apple Crisps were soggy. Mozarella Sticks were stodgy. Sweet Potato Fries, limp and the Banana Bread was undercooked in the middle. Luckily, I have some experience when it comes to baking, so my second time around, attempting some the same recipes, I made adjustments. My sweet potato fries are delicious and my husband finished my banana nut loaf in two days. Needless to say, do not rely on the recipe book (I am sure a lot of information was hurried/omitted to keep it looking attractive) but take the time to visit other cooking website or rely on your own cooking knowledge. For example, I don't think there is any appliance in the world that can cook a loaf of banana bread in 30 minutes at a low temp.When cooking other things, such as tator-tots, veggie chicken nuggets, corn dogs, etc. the air fryer works extremely well! You can keep using the same temperature you would usually when cooking things like these, simply take it out of the air fryer a few minutes earlier.For that, I lowered the stars in the "Easy to Use" category because you, most of the time, have to watch your food until you learn/memorize what settings, cooking temps and cooking times to adjust. Once I become more familiar with the product, I'm sure I will love it. Right now, it is an adventure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and easy to create meals
reviews.reviewText: I use this airfryer oven for every meal almost. It definitely saves time compared to stove/gas cooking. I have reheated pizza and toasted bread. I used the grilling function out on semifrozen salmon which worked beautifully compared to using the stove oven. Also fried some pork. It comes with a bottom tray to catch oil and crumbs.The size is decent and easy to clean with no extra hard to reach corners or ridges. Also love how the buttons surface is easy to clean and press.This thing comes with the mitt and lots of accessories too. I have yet to try the rotisserie function. Will update in the future if I ever do. My first time owning something like this and i feel it's definitely nice that this thing is everything you need for cooking all in one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a great purchase so far!
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer took me a long time to settle on and after ready so many reviews for the “big name” air fryer oven combos, I was frustrated to say the least. I saw this one with just a few reviews but all were positive and I decided to give it a shot and so far it has been a wonderful purchase! I’m still learning the timing on some of my favorite things, but it cooks evenly and I’d very quiet. It feels sturdy and is all metal with no plastic parts, which is great. I’ve only had it a few days but everything has come out great! Highly recommend this oven. The only bad thing I will say is that the website for the company is lacking alot and they don’t seem to have replacement pieces but I doubt you will need them… just something to think of. Otherwise, this is a wonderful product.
